purpleculture_pinyin:
héng
horizontal; across; crosswise; horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters); to place (sth) flat (on a surface); to cross (a river, etc); in a jumble; chaotic; (in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable; violent
горизонтальный; через; крест-накрест; горизонтальный штрих (китайскими иероглифами); разместить (стх) ровно (на поверхности); перейти (река и т. д.); в беспорядке; хаотичный; (в фиксированных выражениях) резкий и необоснованный; жестокий

hèng
harsh and unreasonable; unexpected
резкий и необоснованный; непредвиденный

橫幅 [ héng fú ]: horizontal scroll; banner; streamer
橫跨 [ héng kuà ]: to span; to stretch across; to travel across

橫財 [ hèng cái ]: easy money; windfall; ill-gotten gains; undeserved fortune; illegal profit

Ru_trainchinese:
héng: (прил/глаг) горизонтальный; с востока на запад или с запада на восток; поперечный; пересекать по горизонтали
héng: (сущ) горизонтальная черта
héng: (графема) буйно, безудержно; жестоко, яростно
hèng: (прил) безрассудный, дерзкий; неожиданный, неблагоприятный
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A tree went all yellow. It died and fell down, ending up horizontal.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " wood " to " yellow ", the original meaning is the fence of the door. "Shuowen": "Lan Mu Ye. From the wood, the yellow sound." Duan Yucai's note: "Lan, the door covers the Ye. The extension is the shelter of the place. Anything with the wooden lan is called the horizontal." "Yuefu Collection of Poems, Songs of the Qing Dynasty, Songs of the Midnight, 15th Midnight Songs": "The door is uneasy and has no relevant meaning."

" Horizontal " can mean horizontal. As opposed to " vertical ", north-south is vertical and east-west is horizontal; straight lines are vertical and horizontal lines are horizontal. Northern Zhou Yuxin's "Xiaoyuan Fu": "It's still eight or nine feet away, dozens of steps horizontally and horizontally."

" Horizontal " also means horizontal placement, making the object horizontal. "Han Feizi-Shuo Lin Shang": "Fu Yang, when a tree is horizontal, it is born, when a tree is fallen, it is born, and when a tree is broken, it is born again."

" Heng " also means crossing. "Songs of the Chu‧Nine Songs‧Xiang Jun": "Looking at the river in the Yangtze River, and the river across the river." Wang Yi's note: "The river is horizontal."

" Horizontal " also means traverse. "The Book of Mountains and Seas‧The Western Classic of the Wilderness": "Where there is Liguangzhiye, there is a horizontal road." Guo Pu's note: "Assert the way."

" Horizontal " also refers to staggered. "Book of Rites: Sacrifice to Righteousness": "A husband's filial piety, put it in the sky and the earth, and Pu it across the world."

" Horizontal " also refers to Lian Heng during the Warring States Period, as opposed to "Heng Zong". "Han Feizi‧ loyalty and filial piety": "The princes said that the follower said: "Congcheng must be hegemonic"; the horizontal one said: "Hengcheng must be the king."

" Horizontal " also means full. "Han Shu·Liyue Zhi": "Raise Jinguang, Hengtai River."

" Heng " also means Heng Chen. One of Jin Zuosi's "Zhou Yin": "Zhang Ce recruits hermits.

" Horizontal " can also mean staring and staring. "Songs of the Chu-Nine Debates": "Ye Yanyi is colorless, and the branches are bothered and crossed." Wang Yi's note: "Cortiao error correction."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " wood " and " yellow ", the original meaning is the fence of the door.
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「黃」聲，本義為門的欄木。《說文》：「闌木也。从木，黃聲。」 段玉裁注：「闌，門遮也。引伸為凡遮之偁。凡以木闌之皆謂之橫也。」《樂府詩集‧清商曲辭一‧子夜歌十五》：「攡門不安橫，無復相關意。」

　　「橫」可表示橫向，與「縱」相對，南北為縱，東西為橫；直線為縱，平線為橫。北周庾信〈小園賦〉：「猶得欹側八九丈，縱橫數十步。」

　　「橫」也表示橫置，使物體成橫向。《韓非子‧說林上》：「夫楊，橫樹之即生，倒樹之即生，折而樹之又生。」

　　「橫」還表示橫渡。《楚辭‧九歌‧湘君》：「望涔陽兮極浦，橫大江兮揚靈。」 王逸注：「橫度大江。」

　　「橫」亦表示橫斷。《山海經‧大荒西經》：「處栗廣之野，橫道而處。」郭璞注：「言斷道也。」

　　「橫」也指交錯。《禮記‧祭義》：「夫孝，置之而塞乎天地，溥之而橫乎四海。」

　　「橫」還指戰國時期的連橫，與「合縱」相對。《韓非子‧忠孝》：「諸侯言從者曰：『從成必霸』；而言橫者曰：『橫成必王』。」

　　「橫」還表示充滿。《漢書‧禮樂志》：「揚金光，橫泰河。」

　　「橫」也表示橫陳。晉左思〈招隱〉之一：「杖策招隱士，荒塗橫古今。」

　　「橫」還能表示睨視、瞪起。《楚辭‧九辯》：「葉菸邑而無色兮，枝煩挐而交橫。」王逸注：「柯條糾錯。」
humanum_short_description: 從「木」，「黃」聲，本義為門的欄木。

①跟地面平行的，與“豎”、“直”相對：橫樑。橫楣。橫額。橫幅。橫批。橫披(長條形橫幅字畫)。橫匾。橫標。橫空。
②左右向的，跟目視方向垂直的，與“豎”、“直”、“縱”相對：橫寫。橫排。橫向。橫斜。縱橫。
③地理學上指東西向的：與“縱”相對：橫貫東西。
④縱直豎。
橫向 [ héng xiàng ]: horizontal; orthogonal; perpendicular; lateral; crosswise
橫行 [ héng xíng ]: to go on the rampage; to riot; to run amuck
橫幅 [ héng fú ]: horizontal scroll; banner; streamer
橫跨 [ héng kuà ]: to span; to stretch across; to travel across
①兇暴，不講理；蠻橫。強橫。橫暴。橫蠻。
②意外的，不尋常的：橫財。橫禍。橫事。橫死。
③縱直豎。
橫禍 [ hèng huò ]: unexpected calamity
橫財 [ hèng cái ]: easy money; windfall; ill-gotten gains; undeserved fortune; illegal profit

Meaning: horizontal

Story: A tree went all yellow. It died and fell down, ending up horizontal.
Kind: traditional

從「 木 」，「 黃 」聲，本義為門的欄木。《說文》：「闌木也。从木，黃聲。」 段玉裁注：「闌，門遮也。引伸為凡遮之偁。凡以木闌之皆謂之橫也。」《樂府詩集‧清商曲辭一‧子夜歌十五》：「攡門不安橫，無復相關意。」 「 橫 」可表示橫向，與「 縱 」相對，南北為縱，東西為橫；直線為縱，平線為橫。北周庾信〈小園賦〉：「猶得欹側八九丈，縱橫數十步。」 「 橫 」也表示橫置，使物體成橫向。《韓非子‧說林上》：「夫楊，橫樹之即生，倒樹之即生，折而樹之又生。」 「 橫 」還表示橫渡。《楚辭‧九歌‧湘君》：「望涔陽兮極浦，橫大江兮揚靈。」 王逸注：「橫度大江。」 「 橫 」亦表示橫斷。《山海經‧大荒西經》：「處栗廣之野，橫道而處。」郭璞注：「言斷道也。」 「 橫 」也指交錯。《禮記‧祭義》：「夫孝，置之而塞乎天地，溥之而橫乎四海。」 「 橫 」還指戰國時期的連橫，與「合縱」相對。《韓非子‧忠孝》：「諸侯言從者曰：『從成必霸』；而言橫者曰：『橫成必王』。」 「 橫 」還表示充滿。《漢書‧禮樂志》：「揚金光，橫泰河。」 「 橫 」也表示橫陳。晉左思〈招隱〉之一：「杖策招隱士，荒塗橫古今。」 「 橫 」還能表示睨視、瞪起。《楚辭‧九辯》：「葉菸邑而無色兮，枝煩挐而交橫。」王逸注：「柯條糾錯。」
From the sound of " wood" to " yellow", the original meaning is the fence of the door. "Shuowen": "Lan Mu Ye. From the wood, the yellow sound." Duan Yucai's note: "Lan, the door covers the Ye. The extension is the shelter of the place. Anything with the wooden lan is called the horizontal." "Yuefu Collection of Poems, Songs of the Qing Dynasty, Songs of the Midnight, 15th Midnight Songs": "The door is uneasy and has no relevant meaning." " Horizontal" can mean horizontal. As opposed to " vertical", north-south is vertical and east-west is horizontal; straight lines are vertical and horizontal lines are horizontal. Northern Zhou Yuxin's "Xiaoyuan Fu": "It's still eight or nine feet away, dozens of steps horizontally and horizontally." " Horizontal" also means horizontal placement, making the object horizontal. "Han Feizi-Shuo Lin Shang": "Fu Yang, when a tree is horizontal, it is born, when a tree is fallen, it is born, and when a tree is broken, it is born again." " Heng" also means crossing. "Songs of the Chu‧Nine Songs‧Xiang Jun": "Looking at the river in the Yangtze River, and the river across the river." Wang Yi's note: "The river is horizontal." " Horizontal" also means traverse. "The Book of Mountains and Seas‧The Western Classic of the Wilderness": "Where there is Liguangzhiye, there is a horizontal road." Guo Pu's note: "Assert the way." " Horizontal" also refers to staggered. "Book of Rites: Sacrifice to Righteousness": "A husband's filial piety, put it in the sky and the earth, and Pu it across the world." " Horizontal" also refers to Lian Heng during the Warring States Period, as opposed to "Heng Zong". "Han Feizi‧ loyalty and filial piety": "The princes said that the follower said: "Congcheng must be hegemonic"; the horizontal one said: "Hengcheng must be the king." " Horizontal" also means full. "Han Shu·Liyue Zhi": "Raise Jinguang, Hengtai River." " Heng" also means Heng Chen. One of Jin Zuosi's "Zhou Yin": "Zhang Ce recruits hermits. " Horizontal" can also mean staring and staring. "Songs of the Chu-Nine Debates": "Ye Yanyi is colorless, and the branches are bothered and crossed." Wang Yi's note: "Cortiao error correction."

橫字的基本解释

橫
héng
同“横”。

橫
hèng
同“横”。

橫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［héng］
［《廣韻》户盲切，平庚，匣。］
“橫1”的新字形。
(1)门的栏木。
(2)横的方向。地理上东西向的。与“纵”相对。
(3)横的方向。指纬线。
(4)横的方向。跟地面平行的。参见“横梁”、“横額”。
(5)横的方向。从左到右或从右到左。
(6)横的方向。跟物体长的一边垂直的。
(7)横置，使物体成横向。
(8)指战国时期的连横。
(9)侧，旁边。亦特指坐席或房屋主位两旁的。参见“横頭”、“横屋”。
(10)横陈。
(11)横渡；横越。
(12)横断。
(13)充满；遮盖。
(14)交错，错杂。
(15)睨视；瞪起。
(16)谓下决心不顾一切。
(17)汉字笔画的一种。平着运笔自左向右，状如“一”字。
(18)方言。大概。揣测之词。
(19)方言。横坚，反正。
(20)通“衡”。古代检察官。
(21)古地名。故址在今河南省商丘市西南。
(22)姓。《荀子·成相》有横革。
[②]［hèng］
［《廣韻》户孟切，去映，

橫字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　橫； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页555第10
【唐韻】戸盲切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】胡盲切，?音黌。【說文】闌木也。　又【唐韻】縱橫也。東西曰縱，南北曰橫。亦作從橫。【史記·蘇秦傳】合從連衡。【漢書音義】利合爲從，威權相脅爲橫。又【呂覽·離謂篇】失從之意，失橫之事。【註】關東六國爲從，關西爲橫。一曰以六攻一爲從，以一離六爲橫。又【楚辭·招隱】不知橫之與縱。【註】緯曰橫，經曰縱。　又星名。【前漢·天文志】王梁之旁有八星絕漢，曰天橫。　又縣名。【前漢·地理志】橫縣，屬琅邪郡。　又學舍也。與黌通。【後漢·鮑德傳】修起橫舍。　又姓。【風俗通】韓王子成號橫陽君，其後爲氏。　又【唐韻古音】胡光切，音黃。【楚辭·九辯】收恢台之孟夏兮，然欿傺而沈藏。葉菸邑而無色兮，枝煩挐而交橫。　又【集韻】草名。【爾雅·釋草】傅，橫目。【註】一名結縷。俗謂之鼓箏草。　又【集韻】姑黃切，音光。漢門名。　又【集韻】【正韻】?戸孟切，衡去聲。不順理也。【孟子】待我以橫逆。【前漢·吳王傳】吳王日益橫。　又卜兆名。【前漢·文帝紀】卜

橫字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

horizontal
Basic explanation of words
horizontal
héng
Same as "horizontal".
horizontal
hèng
Same as "horizontal".
horizontal
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［héng］
["Guangyun" household blind cut, Ping Geng, box. ]
The new glyph of "horizontal 1".
(1) The railing of the door.
(2) The horizontal direction. Geographically east-west. Contrast with "longitudinal".
(3) The horizontal direction. Refers to the latitude line.
(4) The horizontal direction. Parallel to the ground. See "cross beam", "banner".
(5) The horizontal direction. From left to right or right to left.
(6) The horizontal direction. It is perpendicular to the long side of the object.
(7) Horizontally, so that the object is horizontally.
(8) Refers to Lian Heng during the Warring States Period.
(9) Side, side. Also specifically refers to the seats on both sides of the seat or the house owner. See "Hengtou", "Hengwu".
(10) Hengchen.
(11) Cross; cross.
(12) Transverse.
(13) Full; covered.
(14) Staggered and mixed.
(15) Gaze; stare.
(16) Said to be determined and desperate.
(17) A type of Chinese character strokes. The pen moves horizontally from left to right, like the word "一".
(18) Dialects. probably. The word of speculation.
(19) Dialects. Hengjian, anyway.
(20) Link "balance". Ancient prosecutor.
(21) Ancient place names. The former site was in the southwest of Shangqiu City, Henan Province.
(22) Last name. "Xunzi · Chengxiang" has a horizontal revolution.
